relation: Great for these types of students
a lot of clubs, but very little student participation.
NOTHING, unless you travel into saint louis
Love the options of the various cafeterias, it's just that the food is a little bland
Everyone is non social. The dorms have very strict visitation rules. No one is ever in the halls or with their door open so you don't know any of the other people on your floor.
If you want friends at this school, join a sport.

Very safe. Not a very warm environment. Many other colleges have a lot more student involvement and the students are warm and friendly to each other, but here a lot of the students stay inside of their cliques.

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Great for these types of students ALL TYPES OF STUDENTS. THERE IS SUCH A VARIETY THERE! Tips for prospective students Talk to everyone you can in admissions to see what you can get for scholarships. They truly are there to help! Bang for the buck Everything has been pretty reasonable, and out of everywhere I applied they offered me the biggest scholarship. Am enjoying being here I really enjoy the smaller school feeling. I love how the campus is outside and the exercise you get just walking from class to class. I enjoy all of the people there. Everyone is friendly. I feel like the majority of the professors really care about how you're doing. Am learning a lot I feel challenged everyday by the material itself and also by my professors to think outside the box.
